concept.title: Load Balancing for Local Test Environments

conbody.p: With Katalon TestOps, your tests can be executed in parallel using load-balanced configurations.
To do so, Katalon TestOps distributes Test Executions over Agents to optimize Remote Execution efficiency.
Each Agent can be configured with a unique Threshold. Test Executions can then be setup to minimize Agent idleness.

li.p: You have at least one active Local Test Environment. See: Create a Local Test Environment with an Agent.
